A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A good film but not a great one. The plot is confused and oddly paced\, there are two separate ticking clocks that rob the film of any particular stakes or tension.

There's a cutaway that really serves no purpose other than to occupy some of the main cast and seemingly showcase some aliens and cgi. Theres some quippy dialogue\, but it's rather flailing and misses as often as it hits.

The film itself is pretty enough\, well shot and well performed. It's a fine action film\, but not what I expected from the second film in a saga
